title: Q2 2025 Crypto Market Trends
description: An overview of the most significant trends shaping the cryptocurrency market in the second quarter of 2025.
bulletPoints: Bitcoin dominance rebounds to 48% as institutional investors increase exposure
Ethereum 2.0 staking yields stabilize at 4.5%, attracting long-term holders
DeFi total value locked (TVL) crosses $125B, driven by growth in lending and yield farming
Stablecoin supply growth slows to 8% QoQ amid tightening regulatory frameworks
Altcoin season accelerates with Solana up 35% and Polkadot up 28% in market value
NFT trading volume surges 20% thanks to renewed interest in gaming and metaverse assets
